archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Schedule Routine Service Problem Tests
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description This process schedules routine testing of the specific services.
